Description: Christ appearing to St Antony who sits on the ground at right, after Vouet. 1640 Etching with some engraving
Curator's comments: See comment for 1841,1211.39-1. After a painting executed for the chapel of M. Aubray in the church of the Pères de l'Oratoire, and now in the Musée de Grenoble.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (75)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
